inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure service connection for the Blueprints task. This can be an Azure Management Group or Subscription. By default, this is the location at which the Blueprint is created. If selecting a Management Group, an alternate creation subscription can be specified.

inputs.name: BlueprintPath
inputs.label: Blueprint Path (JSON)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Blueprint JSON file. Should be the fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory..

inputs.name: ArtifactsPath
inputs.label: Artifacts Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Blueprint artifact JSON files. Should be the fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory.

inputs.name: AlternateLocation
inputs.label: Create Blueprint at alternate subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default, Blueprints are created at the Management Group or subscription associated with the Azure Pipeline service connection. Select this option to provide an alternate subscription.

inputs.name: AlternateSubscription
inputs.label: Subscription Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Subscription at which the Blueprint is created.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Blueprint version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Blueprint version. A value of 'Increment' will increment the version number if the version is an integer.
